lines.text: It's the drain from the tub! They took it out and put it on his chest!
They- took the drain out, and put it on his- are you listenin' to yourself?
The drain is a hole, right? And we didn't notice it was missing, because the tub's sealed with concrete!
Yeah, no, it's just the logistics of the-
Ugh, why am I botherin'? You're just messin' with me again.
Took you long enough to pick up on it.
